dc.title: U.S. Department of Education - SFA's Information for Financial Aid Professionals (IFAP)
dc.description: IFAP is an electronic library for financial aid professionals,banks, lenders, institutions and guarantee agencies. IFAP contains technical publications, regulations and policy guidance on the administration of the Department of Education's, Title IV, Student Financial Assistance (SFA) programs.
